Package ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.controller

Provides the Controller as declared in the MVC pattern.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SetupController
    Interface for different types of SetupControllers A setupController is a controller that only is important before the game starts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIPlayer
    AIPlayer represents a computerplayer used in Singleplayer AIPlayer is a computer controlled player
    Client
    Client to create GUI or AIPlayer and establish connection to Server
    ClientConnectionHandler
    Connection Handler between the client and the server.
    ClientPackageFactory
    Utility Class to generate DataPackage for clients to be sent to the Server
    ClientReceiver
    Receiver to handle different types of messages and states
    ControllerTestKit  
    GameViewController
    Controller Class for MainGameWindow.fxml This Controller is responsible for the main game view.
    JoinGameController
    JoinGameController handles all the functionalities for players that need to join an existing server.
    MenuViewController
    MenuViewController handles all the the functionalities of the MainMenu.
    MultiplayerController
    The MultiplayerController handles all functionalities for players creating a multiplayer game.
    PlayController
    Base Controller for controllers responsible during the game defines general behavior of the controllers
    PreGameController
    Abstract Class defining general behavior of the PreGameControllers like SingleplayerController, MultiplayerController and JoinGameController.
    SingleplayerController
    The SingleplayerController handles all functionalities for players creating a singleplayer game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AIPlayer.Smartness
    Difficulty level of the AI-Player
